attributes.action: Change the waiting music on Universal Credit phone line -It's 'Sound Torture'
attributes.additional_details:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Music_in_psychological_operations 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CxH4-aoTlTw

Same small sample of a classical tune played on repeat agin and again and again for up to an hour at a time/every time for decades it's madness. Enough is enough, its a distressing time anyway if you have to ring that number -don't make it any worse and literally effects metal health and sends people mad.
attributes.background: 'Sound Torture' is very real and even the C.I.A has banned it as a torture technique. Change the waiting music on Universal Credit/Jobseeker phone line to i.e "Bob Marley- don't worry about a thing" and vary it. It is literally 'Sound Torture' and torture is illegal. It's time to change the tune.
